Text: Packed with virsus's, pc is now dead
It installed something called Futuremark, but its not them, it was a virus, hiding in %appdata% roaming - futuremark.

Do you know what it did other than install the files you mentioned?

AVG didn't find anything when I checked it. What are you running? I guess I'll have to check my releases better. Thanks for writing
Windows 7, 64 bit, it ran something called umd.exe or something, was only using 575k mem, avast picked it up after a "quick scan"...... that took 3 hours. just slowed down the pc dead
Neither Avast!, nor AVZ with cureit found any threat. It could be some sort of glitch... Does this happen every time you try to scan it?
Oh... btw, didn't work for me. Game launches, menu works, but CTD with error "floating point support not loaded". But I think it is my problem, not that of release.

Dont dl it, its not a skidrow release.
DL at ur own risk
I am getting the same error "floating point support not loaded".  Don't know what the problem is...
